ProductInfo.Features:
Single channel passive video transceiver. PAL/NTSC real-time video transmission.
Includes 2 single channel passive video transceiver.
Exceptional interference rejection and built-in protection setting.
No power in need. Full-motion CCTV video at distances up to 2000ft. Male BNC allows connection directly to the camera or DVR.
Video frequency: DC To 5MHz. Impedance: Coax BNC 75 Ω, UTP, 100Ω. Video CMRR: 60dB typ. Attenuation: 0.5dB typ
ProductInfo.Name: Guardian In-BA2002 2 Pack Single Channel Passive Video Balun Transceiver for Security Surveillance CCTV System DVR with Built-in Protection Setting, and Convenient Wiring Installation (Black)
